newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Romania's President Emil Constantinescu informed the leaders of the parties member of the ruling coalition on his visit to Germany.
* The ruling coalition will remain solid and indestructible, said Petre Roman, head of the Democratic Party.
* Constantinescu will sign today a partnership agreement with the presidents of Ukraine and Moldova during a trilateral summit in the Ukrainian River Danube port of Ismail.
* Romania's upper house of Senate passed a governmental ordonance to accord two GSM telecomunication licences.
